definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: The cork popped out and the champagnegushed from the bottle.
sentences.chinese: 軟木塞啪地一聲蹦了出來，香檳就從瓶口噴出來了。

sentences.english: All it takes is a flying champagne cork or a shooting rubber band.
sentences.chinese: 飛起的香檳軟木塞或者彈起的橡皮筋都可能是禍首。

sentences.english: I stopped it with a cork.
Cork is the ideal material for sealing wine bottles.
sentences.chinese: 軟木塞是密封葡萄酒的理想材料。

sentences.english: Place the matching year CORKS on each bottle to return them to your inventory.
sentences.chinese: 每個瓶子放在軟木塞匹配一年退回給你的庫存。

sentences.english: Can you help me to open this bottle? The cork won't come out.
sentences.chinese: 你能幫我弄開這個瓶子嗎？軟木塞怎麼也拔不出來。

sentences.english: In the cork and wax will test tubes and put them in the mouth shut alcohol light and heat.
sentences.chinese: 用軟木塞及蠟將試管口封死後，放在酒精燈上加熱。

sentences.english: Siphon the wine into the sizes and cork them.
sentences.chinese: 虹吸酒入瓶子並且用軟木塞塞好。

sentences.english: A shuttlecock was a rounded piece of cork with feathers stuck ontop.
sentences.chinese: 毽子是一塊圓形而頂端有毛的軟木塞。

sentences.english: Siphon the wine into the bottles and cork them.
sentences.chinese: 虹吸酒入瓶子並且用軟木塞塞好。

sentences.english: People were skeptical about the change from corks to screwtops," Horn told Reuters.
sentences.chinese: 對於從軟木塞到螺旋瓶蓋的變化，人們還存有質疑。

sentences.english: The cork came out with a loud pop.
He stopped the glass bottle with a cork.
sentences.chinese: 他用軟木塞塞住玻璃瓶。

definition: acrylic (loanword)/see also 壓克力|压克力[ya1 ke4 li4]
ring pull (can)/strap handle (on bus or train)/circular door handle
